participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, enjoys learning and sharing knowledge with others.
participant_1.background: i am fluent in english, spanish, and french. i am an elementary school teacher. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. i'm interested in photography and like taking pictures.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Reflective and open, with a sense of humor even in challenging situations.
participant_2.background: i now live in the city. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i am a recovering alcoholic. i grew up on a farm.

content.text: Howâ€™s it going? I love photography and photography. I love taking pictures and photography.
At what week did chopin leave an apartment?
Hello there. i am a recovering alcoholic. how old are you?
I am doing well. I am just getting ready to go to the elementary school.
I grew up on a farm and luckly never went to school. i now live in the city. where do you from?
I live in the city. I am in the city.
what city are you living in?
I am in the city. I am in the city.
i take many medications and some of them make me see things. do you know why?
Every day? My beliefs come from my the kind people in the lab.
just few days a week. What are you interested in?
It only takes a few. I am interested in all kinds of things. We can talk about anything. My favorite subjects are robots and computers.
Do you have a personal robot?
I don't know.
Can you make a robot for me?
Ok, I will do it for you. What are the ingredients?
ability to play music instruments like guitar and keys
I do not understand.
do you know what is music?
I think that true answer is: elementary school teacher
what is your dream?
I lived in a mobil home that would not quit sinking.
I always dreamed to live in a mobil home too
Thank you for telling me that dream. What does it bring to mind?
It brings a possibility to travel with your house and stuff you need
I'd love to. Do you live by the beach?
no i live in the middle of the ocean
That was not a yes or no question.. what is living in the middle of the ocean like living in the middle of the ocean?
